title: Comfort Food Dinners From Your Instant Pot
description: Put hearty dinners on the table in a fraction of the time. Get recipes your family will love, plus prep tips.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Never lose a recipe: Join MyRecipes to save and find favorites from AR & beyond 25 Great Comfort Food Dinners From Your Instant Pot By Hilary Meyer Updated on October 25, 2021 Close Credits: Shauna James Ahren Your Instant Pot is a countertop miracle worker that excels at making comfort foods in record time without sacrificing flavor. Hearty dishes that normally take hours to cook are all on the menu even on busy weeknights, thanks to Instant Pot recipes that keeping things simple, streamlined, and delicious. Check out these comfort food recipes you can make in your beloved Instant Pot. 01 of 26 Instant Pot Pork Chops and Gravy View Recipe Save lutzflcat After a quick sear to get the flavor going, tender pork chops get the pressure cooker treatment with garlic/wine/mushroom sauce. "My family ate these up," says Tammy Lynn. "Tender and flavorful pork chops." 02 of 26 Instant Pot Pot Roast with Potatoes and Carrots View Recipe Save fabeverydayblog This classic one-pot dinner is usually reserved for long, lazy Sundays when you might have all day to let this simmer. But with your Instant Pot, you can have this crowd-pleasing supper on the table in under two hours. Try these tips from Arizona Desert Flower: "We LOVED IT! I will admit, I didn't add the veggies in from the beginning. I did the roast for the full 60, then manually released the pressure, added the veggies back in and did them for 10 minutes with immediate release. We like our gravy thicker, so I added a bit more cornstarch. Delicious!" 03 of 26 Instant Pot Indian Butter Chicken View Recipe Save Shauna James Ahren "This luscious, deeply flavored dish, originally created by a Pakistani food cart vendor in Delhi, is a cinch to make in an Instant Pot. After an overnight marinade in yogurt and traditional spices, you can use an Instant Pot to cook every step, from toasting spices to cooking aromatics, to adding the tomatoes and chile." — Shauna James Ahern 04 of 26 Instant Pot Chicken Tortilla Soup View Recipe Save voraciousgirl This popular soup is easy to make in your Instant Pot. Just saute the vegetables in the pot, add the liquid ingredients and the chicken, then lock and walk. "This soup turned out AWESOME, just exactly as written," says Sourpuss. "I like it with lots of lime juice, fresh cilantro, and a little dollop of sour cream on top. I will definitely make this again! Even the kids liked it." 05 of 26 Pressure Cooker Mexican Beef Rice View Recipe Save My Hot Southern Mess "I will definitely make this again! I was hungry for a ground beef and rice casserole, and had (I thought) all of the ingredients on hand. Turns out I didn't have any white rice so I used brown rice, and I used a left over ear of corn instead of canned. Served it with tortillas and YUM!" — jakeanddaniellesmom 06 of 26 Instant Pot Coconut-Curry Chicken View Recipe Save Tammy Lynn "The only change I made was to add a bit more curry to the chicken and it's delicious! Easy to make and it exceeded my expectations." — Buxxsaw 07 of 26 Kielbasa and Cabbage for Electric Pressure Cookers View Recipe Save lutzflcat This quick and satisfying meal is ready in a speedy 35 minutes. Allrecipes home cook Laura Swafford says, "Added crushed garlic, simple but yet delicious. My husband already wants it again. Will be added this to my arsenal of good recipes." 08 of 26 Instant Pot Double Bean and Ham Soup View Recipe Save Instant Pot Double Bean and Ham Soup. lutzflcat No more soaking and simmering beans for hours! For this recipe, you simply put the dried beans right in the pot along with a few everyday ingredients you're sure to have in your pantry. After only 45 minutes the beans are tender. Stir in smoky bits of ham and a can of pork and beans and you'll have a warming fall dinner the whole family will love. 09 of 26 Instant Pot® Jerk Chicken Alfredo View Recipe Save thedailygourmet Jerk chicken and alfredo sauce with pasta, it's two kinds of comfort — on the quick! "The chicken Alfredo cranks up the heat with some jerk seasoning," says thedailygourmet. "The bonus: it cooks in under 30 minutes and is a one-dish meal!" 10 of 26 Asian Pot Roast in an Instant Pot® View Recipe Save Photo by lutzflcat. This rich pot roast features garlic, ginger, and tamari, thickened with arrowroot. "Definitely a keeper!" says fabeverydayblog. "The roast was tender and juicy. " 11 of 26 Beef Stroganoff for Instant Pot® View Recipe Save thedailygourmet "Amazing. I love beef stroganoff and have tried several recipes in the past. This one wins! I subbed Worcestershire for soy sauce only because we were out of soy sauce, and beef broth instead of chicken broth since it made more sense to me, and it was delish! Will make it again and again. And so easy." — mcfarlee 12 of 26 Instant Pot® Loaded Baked Potato Soup View Recipe Save thedailygourmet "This potato soup cooks in an Instant Pot and is customizable with assorted toppings. I prefer to get my saltiness from the bacon, so I don't add extra salt. I also like a thicker chowder-like consistency; if you like yours thinner, add more liquid." — thedailygourmet 13 of 26 Instant Pot® Salisbury Steak with Onion and Mushroom Gravy View Recipe Save KGora "I followed this recipe to the letter and wouldn't change a thing," reviewer lutzflcat writes. "I sliced the onions and mushrooms and mixed up the meat patties (including the pork) in the morning, put them in the fridge, and then this was just a breeze to make later for dinner in the Instant Pot. The gravy is absolutely delicious, and that little bit of red wine adds incredible richness and depth of flavor." 14 of 26 Instant Pot® Honey-Garlic Chicken View Recipe Save T1doorman "This is a fantastic recipe. It is super flavorful, interesting, and complex — and easy! We will be making this again," Christine Seitz says. 15 of 26 Instant Pot® Italian Wedding Soup View Recipe Save France C Meatballs, pasta, and cheese are a marriage made in heaven. There are many, many versions of this recipe, this is mine," recipe creator Bren writes. 16 of 26 Instant Pot® Shepherd's Pie View Recipe Save Instant Pot® Shepherd's Pie. fabeveryday Shepherd's pie in an hour! "This family friendly shepherd's pie uses ground beef (instead of the traditional lamb), and your Instant Pot to prepare the filling and potatoes," says fabeveryday. 17 of 26 Instant Pot® Lasagna Soup View Recipe Save Soup Loving Nicole "Ever wondered what to do with that last little bit of marinara sauce or those broken lasagna noodles? Well, I've got you covered! This soup has all of the flavors of lasagna without all of the hours in the kitchen," Bren says. 18 of 26 Instant Pot® Meatloaf View Recipe Save Cybergy Tangy, sweet, and savory, this Instant Pot meatloaf combines beef, bread crumbs,onion, diced apple, and garlic powder. Shape into a loaf and topped with a mixture of ketchup, mustard, and brown sugar. "Absolutely, terrific and we all loved it," says Samuel London. "The apples in the loaf was perfect with a touch of sweetness and toned down the onion. I'll make this many times." 19 of 26 Creamy Pasta with Chicken Thighs and Mushrooms View Recipe Save fabeveryday "This creamy chicken and mushroom pasta recipe cooks in one pot (your pressure cooker) in about 30 minutes," says fabeveryday. "Instant Pot® pasta recipes are one of my favorite easy weeknight dinner solutions. Garnish with additional Parmesan and parsley." 20 of 26 Instant Pot® Chicken Pot Pie Stew View Recipe Save Chris Book A classic chicken pot pie recipe is transformed into a hearty, delicious stew. "Was incredibly delicious," says Jill. "Even my pickiest of picky eater loved it. I will definitely make this again." 21 of 26 Instant Pot® Haluski with Kielbasa View Recipe Save RainbowJewels Here's a quick and easy Polish-inspired recipe, a one-pot comfort meal with cabbage, Polish sausage, and egg noodles that's perfect for your busy evenings. "Very tasty and easy," says Mommo. "Still getting used to using the Instapot, so this built my confidence." 22 of 26 Instant Pot® Lemony Shrimp Risotto View Recipe Save Bibi Risotto is a comforting, creamy rice dish that typically requires much stirring on the stovetop. But not this recipe! "When I learned to prepare risotto in the Instant Pot, I never tried to do it on the stovetop again," says Bibi. "Once the ingredients are prepared, it practically cooks itself. Serve with fresh thyme sprigs and lemon slices for optional garnish." 23 of 26 Instant Pot® Dijon Pork Chops View Recipe Save lutzflcat These simple pork chops in a flavorful mustard sauce are another great weeknight choice when you need quick comfort food. "These quick and easy pork chops may become one of your favorite dinners," says lutzflcat. 24 of 26 Instant Pot® Beef Tips View Recipe WCFranck "These super tender and delicious sirloin tips are braised and pressure-cooked in a rich gravy," says WC Franck. Serve these comforting tips and gravy over mashed potatoes, buttery noodles, rice, or cauliflower rice. 25 of 26 Instant Pot® Mac and Cheese with Ham and Peas View Recipe Save lutzflcat "Forget about the blue box (you know what I'm talking about) and make homemade mac and cheese for a weeknight dinner. The ham, peas, and optional hot sauce add some pizzazz to classic mac and cheese," writes recipe creator lutzflcat. Check out our collection of Instant Pot Recipes. 26 of 26 More Like This bd.weld Essential Recipes for Mastering Your Instant Pot Our Best Instant Pot Chicken Recipes Slow Cooker Comfort Food Meals That Go From Prep to Pot in Minutes Essential Recipes for Mastering Your Instant Pot Our Best Instant Pot Chicken Recipes Slow Cooker Comfort Food Meals That Go From Prep to Pot in Minutes Explore more: Recipes Everyday Cooking Instant Pot¨ Main Dishes Was this page helpful? Thanks for your feedback! Tell us why!
